text:
Out of curiosity, is there a way of setting the default status of the "Advanced Options" within the Page Editor to always open?

As a person who handles many stylistic edits on the page level, always having to expand that whenever moving away and back has become tedious and has me wanting to throw things, at times.

hmm… wonder if this can be done reliably with the chrome <#CBBAW6Z3R|community-browser-extension> ….

I don’t think there is a way to set the default and frankly if there was it would need to be user based and not portal wide, because giving  less tech savvy people easier access to some of those options is a dangerous thing.

They can still access it when it’s hidden in there but it makes it a more intentional choice.

Hm. I can't say I've played around with the <#CBBAW6Z3R|community-browser-extension> before. I'll check it out and see if there is a solution to be worked out there. I wonder if we could get a developer/content manager option at this point to have an 'always active' choice on the account level.

I agree, and I think they’re thinking about user roles more and more over there, because there is some functionality we’ve proposed doing with the extension that HubSpot employees have gone - “that just makes sense, we should have that, we just don’t have a way to differentiate who’s a developer” kind of thing. Because it’s not like it’s a permissions thing. There’s a valid reason say for a business owner to have full permissions for everything, but that doesn’t mean that convenience features intended for developers, make any sense for that business owner or their marketers
Is there a way to turn this off?
I usually find my templates by going to a page using the template, then hitting this guy:
And now every time I do that the welcome message comes up but not my template
Also even if I close that tab it shows up the next time I go into the design manager
<https://share.vidyard.com/watch/gA56GyBLYpZVyNU8UwqAH8>?
hmm, haven’t seen that, looks like something we need to improve the styling for in the darktheme in the extension.
The styling seemed fine to me it’s just that I can’t get to my templates in an easy way now.

Hey thanks for letting us know - we just pushed that new welcome tab to just open the first time but it definitely shouldnt be doing that every time after you've already seen it. Looking into this now cc <@U8G91EPCL>
Building a fix now, should be up soon.
You are the wind beneath my wings
Mind giving it another go? It should be fixed now :crossed_fingers:
Works wonderfully! Thanks Ariel.
I’m finding switching tabs in the design manager to be a little sluggish today
seems to be happening on all portals and it happens kinda randomly.
ive had this happening all day and part of yesterday too
luckily i havent had to be in HS much today
